descriptionHtml:
[size=4]This mod adds a new Standalone Male follower.
You can find him the The Frozen Hearth in Winterhold.
He is Essential.
He cannot be married.

v1.1 was missing files.
v1.11 add files and texture of compression...etc.

v1.20 Required DragonBorn.
Adjustment of the face (such as the formation adjustment around the mouth).
Adding magic wand of the shield treatment.
Thunder cloak + whirlwind cloak + defense up + Dragon Aspect (appearance) magic.
Add the thunder magic that immediately impact.

When he is close to the enemy AI is switched to the melee combat, and defense to fight with the shield.
If the AI does not switch to the melee combat, try to have a strong one-handed weapon.

Credits
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/]Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles by Chris57 and FavoredSoul
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/]Enhanced Character Edit by ECE team
[/url][/size][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35713/]ECEE - RANs Enhanced Character Edit Enhancer [color=#6fa8dc]by [b]RAN46[/b] [/color][/url][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/]
[/url][size=4]Genson Teeth  by @Bell_Genson[/size]
